entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
